original: 魯國鄒縣人，西晉官員。少以勇力聞名，後又習經史典籍。雖然貪財，但似無多少劣跡，被晉武帝任為監軍，監巴東諸軍事。
text: A native of Zou County of Lu State, an official of the Western Jin Dynasty. Less famous for his bravery, and later studied classics and historical books. Although he was greedy for money, he did not seem to have many bad deeds, and was appointed by Emperor Wu of Jin to supervise the military in Badong.
